messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Unschooling conference opportunities
messages.msgSnippet: Confusion/correction. I m sorry.  I thought I had noted this, but I hadn t. I m not speaking at the east Tennessee camp. I included it on the list because
messages.messageBody:
Confusion/correction.
I'm sorry. I thought I had noted this, but I hadn't.
I'm not speaking at the east Tennessee camp.
I included it on the list because Laura's looking for more campers.
I meant to specity that, and thought I had. eeep.


Two things, eastern U.S.:

May 18-20, four authors of this group will speak in Massachusetts
There are still some bunks available in a 12-bed room, and camping is free.
http://allinmay2012.blogspot.com/
Speaking: Me, Joyce Fetteroll, Meredith Novak and Brie Jontry & family



August 12-19, East Tennessee Unschooled Summer camp
http://www.etusc.com/


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Unschooling conference opportunities
messages.msgSnippet: I know the links below are all in the U.S., but I ll be speaking lots of places in the next year and a half--three continents (four if North America is going
messages.messageBody:
I know the links below are all in the U.S., but I'll be speaking lots of places in the next year and a half--three continents (four if North America is going to count), once with Bea Mantovani and Claire Darbaud translating and answering questions in French, several times with Joyce Fetteroll, maybe next year Alex Polikowsky will come to help Marta Pires translate and answer questions in Portugal.
http://speakingsandradodd.blogspot.com/

BUT MORE PRESSING and upcoming:

Two things, eastern U.S.:

May 18-20, four authors of this group will speak in Massachusetts
There are still some bunks available in a 12-bed room, and camping is free.
http://allinmay2012.blogspot.com/

August 12-19, East Tennessee Unschooled Summer camp
http://www.etusc.com/

Other side of the country:

Oregon Conference, Life is Good, May 24-27
http://lifeisgoodconference.com/
And I'm staying there at the hotel two days after, if people here want to hang out longer.

August 2-5 in Sacramento
http://www.hscconference.com/main.html

Florida, October 17-20
http://floridaunschoolingconference.com/
Holly will be there with me.

December 27-30, Albuqueurqe
http://allunschooling2012.blogspot.com/
